head_commit.message:
docs: update release doc and rm binary (#716)

Signed-off-by: laurentsimon <laurentsimon@google.com>

repository.description: Verify provenance from SLSA compliant builders
repository.name: slsa-verifier

results.check_description: The build definition and configuration executed by the build service is verifiably derived from text file definitions stored in a version control system.
justification: Check mcn_build_as_code_1 is set to PASSED because mcn_trusted_builder_level_three_1 PASSED.

results.check_description: Check if the target repo has a valid build script.
justification: Check mcn_build_script_1 is set to PASSED because mcn_build_service_1 PASSED.

results.check_description: Check if the target repo has a valid build service.
justification: Check mcn_build_service_1 is set to PASSED because mcn_build_as_code_1 PASSED.

results.check_description: Check whether the target has intoto provenance.
slsa_requirements: Provenance content - Identifies build instructions - SLSA Level 1
Provenance content - Identifies artifacts - SLSA Level 1
Provenance content - Identifies builder - SLSA Level 1

results.check_description: Check whether the SLSA provenance for the produced artifact conforms to the expected value.
slsa_requirements: Provenance conforms with expectations - SLSA Level 3
justification: Successfully verified the expectation against provenance.

results.check_description: Check whether the target uses a trusted SLSA level 3 builder.
justification: However, could not find a passing workflow run.

results.check_description: Check whether the target repo uses a version control system.
Detects potential pipelines from which an artifact is published.
justification: Unable to find a publishing timestamp for the artifact.

results.check_description: Check whether the target has a level-1 witness provenance.
slsa_requirements: Provenance content - Identifies build instructions - SLSA Level 1
Provenance content - Identifies artifacts - SLSA Level 1
Provenance content - Identifies builder - SLSA Level 1
justification: Failed to discover any witness provenance.
